r.d: This is the Interbase/Firebird MDB2 driver.
r.n: - fixed regression in lastInserID() - fixed bug #15971: typo in standaloneQuery() [elpaso] - fixed bug #16350: typo in setTransactionIsolation() [nilya] - fixed bug #16741: Manager::listTableIndexes and listTableContraints should check NULL or 0 [nilya] - fixed bug #17676: use connection resource when fetching LOBs [renskiy]
